channel.title: Help with player death
channel.description:
when a player dies it crashes the server and ive tryed to look for the sorce of the problem, but i get nothing any ideas?
this is what i get when a player dies
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 21 at client.saveStats(client.java:2547) at client.packetProcess(client.java:6007) at client.packetSending(client.java:5995) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:121) at server.main(server.java:48)

item.title: Help with player death
item.dc:creator: @triforcegod triforcegod
item.description:

when a player dies it crashes the server and ive tryed to look for the sorce of the problem, but i get nothing any ideas?
